byline.original: By ZAHRA NADER and MUJIB MASHAL

lead_paragraph: The attack came on the eve of Ashura, one of the most solemn holidays on the Shiite calendar.

headline.print_headline: Gunmen Hit  Kabul Shrine on the Eve of a Holy Day
headline.main: Gunmen Attack Crowded Shiite Shrine in Kabul

snippet: The attack came on the eve of Ashura, one of the most solemn holidays on the Shiite calendar....
abstract: Gunmen dressed as police officers attack Shiite shrine in Kabul on holiday commemorating death of Prophet Muhammad's grandson, killing at least 14 people and wounding dozens.
